metadata.title: CVE-2016-3921 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libsysutils/src/FrameworkListener.cpp in Framework Listener in Android 4.xbefore 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, 6.x before2016-10-01, and 7.0 before 2016-10-01 allows attackers to gain privilegesvia a crafted application, aka internal bug 29831647.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
